colti:
Technical operations projects series ; no.
            TO 434

abstracts.cdata!:
The credit will meet part of the cost of
            construction of secondary, technical and teacher-training
            schools and equipment in Northern, Eastern, Western and
            Mid-Western Nigeria and the Federal Territory.
